forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear and windy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear and windy. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 7C. W winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 47F. W winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.
